title: Senator Ron Johnson inquires about COVID-19 vaccine safety
author: BROOKE CONRAD; Sinclair Broadcast Group
description: Sen. Ron Johnson, R-Wis. , has stirred controversy in recent days over his concerns about COVID-19 vaccine safety. In a July 13 letter to health agency leaders, Johnson noted a press conference he recently hosted where individuals described "neurological symptoms" they said they experienced post-vaccine. Johnson wrote that he's not sure health officials are properly monitoring for vaccine safety issues.
